timeline.message:
Do not use lock when deleting session

Also just delete session from ZooKeeper right away, other config servers will
pick this up and delete the session there.
ZooKeeper data is deleted earlier on, no need for this here anymore

timeline.body:
```suggestion
            // Deleting an application is done by deleting the remote session, all config
```

This config server will also delete through the watcher?
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// Deleting an application is done by deleting the remote session, other config
// Deleting an application is done by deleting the remote session, all config

This config server will also delete through the watcher?
timeline.author: hakonhall

replies.bodyText: I now think the original comment is correct - delete(RemoteSession) only called in this config server appears to do delete and deactivate the remote session, the same as sessionRemoved(long) which seems to be invoked from watcher.
